medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain after eating a fatty meal.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient began having abdominal pain around 1pm after eating a fatty meal. Pain localized to the right upper quadrant (RUQ) and lasted a few hours. No fevers, chills, nausea, or vomiting were reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension (HTN), gallstones, previous rotator cuff repair.
